room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Game Coeur d'Alene in Coeur d'Alene
room_description: It's just another day on the job for your group of FBI agents. But now, you wish you were anywhere but here. You've just discovered a ticking bomb that's about to blow everyone sky high! There's a note from "The Postal Bomber", who has escaped from prison and promises revenge on the FBI agents who put him behind bars. Disguised as a postal worker, he secretly planted the bomb in the FBI office and locked everyone inside. Can your team disarm the bomb and escape the building before it blows?
